Description: Five fragments of papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text (25 ll. +). Thompson's MS Catalogue: "contract relating to buildings including a wall & a dovecote. Date lost but prob. of Soter II or Alexander I, from Gebelen".
Curator's comments: Kaplony-Heckel, U., Das Getreide-Darlehn P. Haun. Inv. Demot. 2, in K. Ryhol (ed.), Acts of the seventh international conference of Demotic studies. Copenhagen, 2002, 244. Framed together with 10571 A. Not described in www.trismegistos.org under the entry for 10571.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (637) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/637)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: displaced fragments, abraded, fractured Black ink Backed: white paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alan Henderson Gardiner
